definition: not conforming to some norm or socially approved pattern of behavior or thought, someone who refuses to conform to established standards of conduct
details:
adjective
- not conforming to some norm or socially approved pattern of behavior or thought
= example: not conforming to some norm or socially approved pattern of behavior or thought
= synonyms: unconformist
- not conforming to established customs or doctrines especially in religion
= synonyms: nonconforming
noun
- someone who refuses to conform to established standards of conduct
= synonyms: recusant
